Hopsized Brewing
4th Annual Oktoberfest at Hopsized Brewing!
Sep 20,
12:00pm
9201 Cockleshell Court, Unit 13, Bonita Springs, FL, United States, Florida 34135
Map
üéâ Hopsized Brewing's 4th Annual Oktobertest + SWFL Brewers Olympics!
Save The Date and Join us on Saturday, September 20, 2025, from 12pm to 7pm for an awesome day filled with fun, food, music, delicious craft drinks and festivities!
Indulge in authentic German cuisine while enjoying live entertainment with a nice and cold delicious German-style brew, and test your skills in thrilling stein holding competitions!
But that's not all‚Äîget ready for exciting raffles and giveaways, drink specials, and exclusive event glassware to commemorate the day.
So mark your calendars and come celebrate with fellow beer enthusiasts and experience the vibrant spirit of our brewing community in SWFL!üçªü•®‚ú®
Stay Tuned for more information to follow!

Spooktacular Surfside Market At Hopsized Brewing
Oct 26,
12:00pm
9201 Cockleshell Court, Unit 13, Bonita Springs, FL, United States, Florida 34135
Map
‚òÄÔ∏éWelcome to The Surfside Market!‚òÄÔ∏é
We‚Äôre thrilled to introduce ourselves as we make our way into sunny Southwest Florida!
Running from October to May, our monthly curated outdoor market is all about connecting amazing local artists and small businesses with our wonderful community.
üå¥With the SWFL area blossoming with creativity and entrepreneurial spirit, we wanted to curate an event where local vendors can truly shine.
Here is what you can expect:
You‚Äôll discover everything from vintage treasures and beautiful handmade crafts to captivating artwork, trendy boutique clothing, plants, jewelry, a kid friendly designated zone, non-alcoholic drink stations throughout the event venue, raffles, and of course, delicious food and craft drinks!
Our vision for The Surfside Market is to craft an experience that‚Äôs not just unique, but also meaningful. We want to make sure we stand out, which is why we have specific criteria for our vendors. This helps us create a vibrant atmosphere that‚Äôs both engaging and balanced for everyone involved‚Äîour vendors and all of you who join us.
So head on over and reserve your FREE tickets now and secure your event tote bag by ensuring to check in with your ticket at our event tent day on Market Day!
üö®Vendor Scam Alert: The Surfside Market is the SOLE organizer of this event. Any communication will come directly from
[email¬†protected]
If you are interested in applying to the vendor market, contact via email or visit the Instagram page for more information on how to register.üö®

about us

our
story
Hopsized Brewing Co. started off like most craft-breweries: homebrewing in a garage! Originally from Miami, Florida, co-founders Ana and Darlyn (a.k.a Vic) relocated to Fort Myers in 2016. Vic began homebrewing May of 2019, following suggestions from Ana, given his growing love for craft beers at the time, especially NEIPAs. A few months later, they were off to winning awards at local homebrewing competitions.
Vic continued to expand his knowledge for brewing, applying his background in science each step of the way, from learning water chemistry, recipe creation, hop utilization, blending, survivables, the importance of pH, and healthy yeast management. It wasn‚Äôt long before their entrepreneurial drive led them to formulate a business plan. A little over 2.5 years later, Hopsized Brewing Co. opened its doors in beautiful Bonita Springs, Florida.

Hobbies:
